title: DataList
shortDescriptionOfTheTag: The <datalist> tag specifies a list of pre-defined options for an <input> element.

usageExamples.title: Example 1
usageExamples.description: Create a datalist with options for an input field
usageExamples.code:
<input list="browsers" name="browser">
<datalist id="browsers">
  <option value="Chrome">
  <option value="Firefox">
  <option value="Safari">
</datalist>
